00023 #ifndef __NITF_IO_INTERFACE_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_IO_INTERFACE_HPP__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/System.hpp"
00027 #include "nitf/Object.hpp"
00028 #include "nitf/IOInterface.h"
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00034 namespace nitf
00035 {
00036 
00041 DECLARE_CLASS(IOInterface)
00042 {
00043 public:
00044 
00046     IOInterface(const IOInterface & x)
00047     {
00048         setNative(x.getNative());
00049     }
00050 
00052     IOInterface & operator=(const IOInterface & x)
00053     {
00054         if (&x != this)
00055             setNative(x.getNative());
00056         return *this;
00057     }
00058 
00059     // Set native object
00060     IOInterface(nitf_IOInterface * x)
00061     {
00062         setNative(x);
00063         getNativeOrThrow();
00064     }
00065 
00067     virtual ~IOInterface(){}
00068 
00069     virtual void read(char * buf, size_t size) {}
00070 
00071     virtual void write(const char * buf, size_t size) throw(nitf::NITFException) {}
00072 
00073     virtual nitf::Off seek(nitf::Off offset, int whence) throw(nitf::NITFException) { return -1; }
00074 
00075     virtual nitf::Off tell() throw(nitf::NITFException) { return -1; }
00076 
00077     virtual nitf::Off getSize() throw(nitf::NITFException) { return -1; }
00078 
00079     virtual void close() {}
00080 
00081 private:
00082     static NITF_BOOL IOInterfaceImpl_read(NITF_DATA* data,
00083             char* buf, size_t size, nitf_Error* error);
00084 
00085     static NITF_BOOL IOInterfaceImpl_write(NITF_DATA* data,
00086             const char* buf, size_t size, nitf_Error* error);
00087 
00088     static nitf::Off IOInterfaceImpl_seek(NITF_DATA* data,
00089             nitf::Off offset, int whence, nitf_Error* error);
00090 
00091     static nitf::Off IOInterfaceImpl_tell(NITF_DATA* data, nitf_Error* error);
00092 
00093     static nitf::Off IOInterfaceImpl_getSize(NITF_DATA* data, nitf_Error* error);
00094 
00095     static NITF_BOOL IOInterfaceImpl_close(NITF_DATA* data, nitf_Error* error);
00096 
00097     static void IOInterfaceImpl_destruct(NITF_DATA* data);
00098 
00099 protected:
00100 
00102     nitf_IIOInterface getIOInterfaceImpl()
00103     {
00104         nitf_IIOInterface iIOHandle =
00105         {
00106             &IOInterfaceImpl_read,
00107             &IOInterfaceImpl_write,
00108             &IOInterfaceImpl_seek,
00109             &IOInterfaceImpl_tell,
00110             &IOInterfaceImpl_getSize,
00111             &IOInterfaceImpl_close,
00112             &IOInterfaceImpl_destruct,
00113         };
00114         return iIOHandle;
00115     }
00116 
00118     IOInterface() throw (nitf::NITFException);
00119 
00120     nitf_Error error;
00121 };

00129 class NativeIOInterface : public IOInterface
00130 {
00131 public:
00132     // Set native object
00133     NativeIOInterface(nitf_IOInterface * x) : IOInterface(x) {}
00134 
00135     NativeIOInterface() : IOInterface() {}
00136 
00137     virtual ~NativeIOInterface() {}
00138 
00139     virtual void read(char * buf, size_t size);
00140 
00141     virtual void write(const char * buf, size_t size) throw(nitf::NITFException);

00144
